actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
tk.ticket_id,
tk.retailer_id,
tk.ticket_status,
tk.created_time,
tk.issue_type,
tk.issues,
tk.new_code,
ag.agent_id,
ag.agent_name,
ag.agent_status,
ret.retailer_name,
ret.contact,
ret.area_zone,
ret.status,
ret.retailer_email,
case when ret.status= 'INACTIVE' or ret.stop_date <= current_date then true else false end as status_check,
ret_version.ver
 FROM ticket as tk
left join agent ag on ag.agent_id=tk.agent_id
left join retailer as ret on ret.retailer_code=tk.retailer_id
join (select max(version) as ver,retailer_id from ticket group by retailer_id having retailer_id = {{status_table.selectedRow.retailer_id}}) as ret_version on  ret_version.retailer_id=tk.retailer_id
where
(tk.ticket_id)=({{status_table.triggeredRow.ticket_id}})
